svg.text:
title: "Week in Ethereum News
April 22, 2023" date: "2023-04-21"
• A list of what exactly might make it into Dencun besides 4844 (protodankscaling). Discussion at the next call on April 27
A list of what exactly might make it into Dencun besides 4844 (protodankscaling). Discussion at the next call on April 27
• Latest consensus layer devs call . Notes from Christine Kim EIP4788 (expose CL state in EL) likely included in Dencun 4844 devnet5 next
week discussion of long-lived subnets to reduce bandwidth use
Latest consensus layer devs call . Notes from Christine Kim
• EIP4788 (expose CL state in EL) likely included in Dencun
EIP4788 (expose CL state in EL) likely included in Dencun
• discussion of long-lived subnets to reduce bandwidth use
discussion of long-lived subnets to reduce bandwidth use
• KZG ceremony is open again for public contributions, but your Eth account needs over 128 mainnet transactions. If the waiting list
declines, then the threshold will be reduced. Follow @carlbeek to find out if threshold is reduced
KZG ceremony is open again for public contributions, but your Eth account needs over 128 mainnet transactions. If the waiting list
• Four options for transitioning to Verkle trees would look like
Four options for transitioning to Verkle trees would look like
• Two slots proposer builder separation with unconditional payment
Two slots proposer builder separation with unconditional payment
• Paprika , Nethermind’s experimental storage abstraction of Patricia tree
Paprika , Nethermind’s experimental storage abstraction of Patricia tree
• Equivocation attacks in MEV-boost and ePBS
Equivocation attacks in MEV-boost and ePBS
• Optimistic relays increase validator profits and are cheaper to maintain
Optimistic relays increase validator profits and are cheaper to maintain
• How to track the performance of your validator
How to track the performance of your validator
• Benchmarking bandwidth consumption with Shapella (Geth and Lighthouse) finds ~20% increase
Benchmarking bandwidth consumption with Shapella (Geth and Lighthouse) finds ~20% increase
• Lighthouse v4.1 - fix excessive CPU usage
Lighthouse v4.1 - fix excessive CPU usage
• Rocketpool Atlas upgrade live, allows staking with 8 ETH and triples Rocketpool’s capacity
Rocketpool Atlas upgrade live, allows staking with 8 ETH and triples Rocketpool’s capacity
• How to start running a distributed validator with Obol
How to start running a distributed validator with Obol
• Client diversity coming with Optimism’s Bedrock upgrade: Magi, a16z’s Optimism client in rust OP-Erigon , a fork of Erigon for Optimism
• Magi, a16z’s Optimism client in rust
Magi, a16z’s Optimism client in rust
• OP-Erigon , a fork of Erigon for Optimism
OP-Erigon , a fork of Erigon for Optimism
• EIPs: EIP6888 : EVM math checking EIP6913 : SETCODE instruction EIP6914 : Reuse withdrawn validator indices
• ERCs: ERC6882 : sharable interface for borrowing ERC6884 : Extendable Utility Tokens Derived from Origin NFTs ERC6916 : Automatic reset
of testnet ERC6912 : Versioned TokenIDs for Dynamic NFTs ERC6909 : simplified alternative to erc1155 ERC6900 : modular smart contracts
• ERC6884 : Extendable Utility Tokens Derived from Origin NFTs
ERC6884 : Extendable Utility Tokens Derived from Origin NFTs
• ERC6912 : Versioned TokenIDs for Dynamic NFTs
ERC6912 : Versioned TokenIDs for Dynamic NFTs
This newsletter is made possible thanks to the funding received from Optimism’s RetroPGF !
Thank you to Optimism’s RetroPGF round 2 which generously funded Week in Ethereum News for “months, not weeks.”
• viem v0.3.x , bugfixes and ethcall batch aggregation
viem v0.3.x , bugfixes and ethcall batch aggregation
• wagmi’s plan for migrating to viem
wagmi’s plan for migrating to viem
• ZeroMEV API , transaction level MEV summary data
ZeroMEV API , transaction level MEV summary data
• Hundred hacked for 7.4m on Optimism, due to poorly deployed fork of compound v2
• Gas prices highest this week since the Merge (ie ~80 gwei during UTC day and ~35 gwei during UTC night) lead to over 100k burned since
Gas prices highest this week since the Merge (ie ~80 gwei during UTC day and ~35 gwei during UTC night) lead to over 100k burned since the
• Devconnect announced in Istanbul for November 13-19
Devconnect announced in Istanbul for November 13-19
• Société Générale launches Euro stablecoin on mainnet
• Kwenta launches SmartMargin and currently has 3 different rewards programs for traders
Kwenta launches SmartMargin and currently has 3 different rewards programs for traders

Use an onchain NFT as your Uniswap frontend

Brantly Millegan’s proposal for an onchain follow protocol

Who is delegating to you in DAOs ?

Ameen announces Hai , multi-collateral Rai fork on optimism

What can you do with zk-ECDSA at the app layer?
• Snr React Native UI Dev at Status: All jobs
Snr React Native UI Dev at Status: All jobs
• Solidity team are looking for a highly skilled Dev Advocate
Solidity team are looking for a highly skilled Dev Advocate
• EF Ecosystem Support Program seek a Grant Analyst & Liaison
EF Ecosystem Support Program seek a Grant Analyst & Liaison
Job listings: $600 for four issues (75 character limit), payable to abcoathup.eth. Questions? abcoathup at-gmail
• Coinbase licensed in Bermuda to launch derivatives exchange
Coinbase licensed in Bermuda to launch derivatives exchange
• Gensler repeatedly refuses to say ETH is not a security , even though in 2018 he recognized that ETH was not a security
Gensler repeatedly refuses to say ETH is not a security , even though in 2018 he recognized that ETH was not a security
• SEC labels Algorand an unregistered security in complaint against Bittrex. In 2019, Gary Gensler caught on tape pumping Algorand
SEC labels Algorand an unregistered security in complaint against Bittrex.
• In 2019, Gary Gensler caught on tape pumping Algorand
• Gary Gensler’s contradiction in the middle
Gary Gensler’s contradiction in the middle
• Europe votes for uniform legal framework for EU crypto markets
Europe votes for uniform legal framework for EU crypto markets
• Next week Alex Pertsev to be released to house arrest to prepare for June trial
Next week Alex Pertsev to be released to house arrest to prepare for June trial
• Consensys reports data leak of Metamask support tickets
Consensys reports data leak of Metamask support tickets
• Tayvano on a mysterious wallet drainer , where there is no common thread between compromised keys
Tayvano on a mysterious wallet drainer , where there is no common thread between compromised keys
• If you haven’t yet, make sure your iPhone and iOS are up to date
If you haven’t yet, make sure your iPhone and iOS are up to date
Follow @WeekinEthNews to find out what the most clicked links are. Follow @abcoathup and @evan_van_ness to get most of the week’s news in
• Apr 25 - May 9 – Gitcoin Program Beta Round
Apr 25 - May 9 – Gitcoin Program Beta Round
• Apr 27-30 – Istanbul ETH Privacy conference & hackathon
